thread.section_title: Archer Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best sleep of my life!
thread.title_full: Best sleep of my life! - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JenHillJHCCS
title: Best sleep of my life!
text:
I was in NYC for an event and picked this hotel based on the good reviews and location. The rooms were on the smaller side (which is to be expected in NYC) and there was no bathtub in my Empire State view double room, but in general it was a good experience. The beds were amazingly comfortable. One night I slept 12 hours straight because I was so cozy.
The bathrooms have good amenities, and there is a great bar upstairs called the Spyglass with beautiful views and decent cocktails.
They were also very thoughtful and sent a birthday cake up for my birthday along with nightly chocolates or sweets.
It is conveniently located a few blocks from the Theater areas and two blocks from Bryant park. PS. Blue bottle coffee in Bryant park has the best coffee in town!
There is also a great 99 cent pizza place less than a block away for great "safety pizza."
The staff were very friendly and accommodating and there was a Nespresso machine in the room, which was nice and coffee downstairs each morning in the lobby (though it was a bit like warm for my taste).
Overall, I had a pleasant stay and did not have too many complaints about the hotel.
